definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The first man's neighbours were unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 第一个男人的邻居不乐于助人。

sentences.english: We all admire his readiness to help others.
sentences.chinese: 我们都佩服他乐于助人的精神。

sentences.english: Those who are recl posty to help others have responsibility .
sentences.chinese: 乐于助人的人有责任心。

sentences.english: Lei Feng is always ready to help people.
Yeah. He's always ready to help and gives a leg-up in critical time.
sentences.chinese: 是埃他总是乐于助人，常常在关键时刻助人一臂之力。

sentences.english: because people are pretty helpful around here, so.
sentences.chinese: 因为这里的人都很乐于助人。

sentences.english: My grandfather is also warm-hearted to his neighbors and is always ready to help them.
sentences.chinese: 姥爷对邻居也很热心，他总是乐于助人。

sentences.english: There he will always optimistic spirit of helpfulness.
sentences.chinese: 还有他永远乐观的乐于助人的精神。

sentences.english: Such is the boy, a warm-hearted child who is always ready to help others.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子就是这样一个热心肠的人，总是乐于助人。

sentences.english: He was always ready to help others, in return, he was liked by everyone.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐于助人，作为回报，大家都喜欢他。

sentences.english: Grandfather is very arm-hearted to his neighbors and is al ays ready to help them.
sentences.chinese: 姥爷对邻居们也很热心，总是乐于助人。

sentences.english: He was very, very, giving. This was his great love.
sentences.chinese: 他非常非常乐于助人，这是他最可爱的一点。

sentences.english: Your interest in helping others may take you back to school.
sentences.chinese: 你乐于助人的兴趣可能会将你重新带回学校。

sentences.english: Chen Juan is always ready to help others.

sentences.chinese: 不要代替聪明的乐于助人。

definition: to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to abandon self for others (idiom, from Analects); to sacrifice one's own interest for other people/altruism
to uphold justice/to be loyal (to one's friends)/to stick by
to be loyal (to one's friends)/to value loyalty
respect the old and cherish the young
